title: New config, game refusing to start
body: Got a new machine and the client keeps on flickering between the desktop and the loading screen. Then a bsod pops with it's awful smiley face in the windows 10 and my machine restarts. How can i fix this? I downloaded the game today.

replies.body: Ouch that's an unsettling issue to confront.  Since you have a new rig, make sure that your OS is up to date as well as your drivers.  They might be struggle to render your game properly, but the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide should help tune up your settings.

My league client has no issues but the in game client flickers and then crashes the laptop. It's a Nvidia MX150 and all the other games are running fine. I can't start any game as it constantly flickers. My refresh rate us 60 fps and i changed league's graphic settings but it's still not compatible. Please help out.

Hey, it's super important to run over those steps to rule out any possibilities.  You may also need to check your air vents in case of overheating.  Should the issue persist, download [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs and submit them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will be able to get more context and assist you directly.
This is my  #32252075 Ticket ID. Thank you for being patient with me!

Check out this link 
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/gs5eLOzJ-how-to-fix-bfb-black-flashing-bars-for-nvidia-users

Guess a couple of people have experienced the same issue. But the problem still persists with me as i don't actually see any .exe files of League inside the Nvidia Program Settings in Manage 3D Settings.
And the funny thing is. it flickers only in full screen and not when it's windowed
